title: What are the chances that Melania Trump will file for divorce on the day after Biden is installed as president? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh, I imagine her prenup, renegociated while they were living separately after the 2016 election, probably specifies that she may not file while he is President. I expect that the papers have already been drawn up, sitting in her lawyers office, waiting to be filed after noon, January 20th. After all, she needs to get her money while the getting is good, before it is all spent on lawyers or confiscated for unpaid taxes or fines.

What are the chances that Melania Trump will file for divorce on the day after Biden is installed as president?She not happy with her husband I suspect but of the two she is by far smarter than he could ever imagine. When she determines the time is right she will send him down the road. Will that be the day after he is out of office is up to her. Time will tell!
